product_name: Surftech Bamboo Generator Stand Up Paddleboard - 10' 6"
long_description: Nimble enough to easily handle waves yet very stable on flatwater tours, the Surftech Bamboo Generator 10 ft. 6 in. Stand Up Paddleboard offers a versatile design for any water condition.
